scene_1.narration: In the Kuru kingdom, King Shantanu rules with wisdom. His son Bhishma stands tall, proud and loyal. The kingdom is peaceful and grand, with a beautiful palace and gardens. This is where the epic story of Mahabharata begins, setting the stage for a great adventure.
